LeftShiftRegister Properties

Requires: VI Scripting

Inherits from Tunnel. View the class hierarchy.

PropertyDescription
Is An Error RegisterReturns true if the shift register is an error register, else returns false. An error register is a special form of shift register that can only exist on a For Loop configured for parallel iterations and when the data type of the shift register is the error cluster. Details
Right Shift RegisterReturns a reference to the right shift register. Details
